text: A photomontage is an image made of two or more photographs. It is made by cutting and joining the photographs together into an illusion of subject that is not real. A similar method is used today with digital photography, using image-editing software. Photomontage can also mean the way of making a photomontage. == Related pages == * Collage == References== == Other websites == * Category:Art Photomontage
title: Photomontage
